database_title: Access Alberta Legal - 4 Month Development Timeline

records.title: Setup - Project Foundation & Legal Research
records.description: LIGHT WEEK - Classes starting, add/drop period. Gather Alberta court forms, study PIPA requirements, create documentation structure. NO heavy coding.
records.success_criteria: 50+ court forms collected, PIPA requirements documented, project repo initialized, development environments installed (not configured)
records.dependencies: None - initial project setup
records.risks: Add,drop chaos limiting availability (20-30% capacity expected), course load uncertainty
records.reference:
- Alberta Court Forms Database: https://albertacourts.ca/court-forms
- PIPA Compliance Guide: https://oipc.ab.ca/guidance/pipa/
- Legal Tech Best Practices: https://www.cba.org/Publications-Resources/Practice-Resources/Law-Practice-Management/Technology

records.title: Professional Networking & Legal Tech Community Building
records.description: Join Alberta legal tech communities, establish professional LinkedIn presence, identify potential partners and mentors in the legal technology space.
records.success_criteria: 3 legal tech group memberships, 10+ professional connections, LinkedIn presence established, 2 industry newsletters subscribed
records.dependencies: Project overview materials prepared
records.risks: Time management conflicts, low response rates from professionals, networking events scheduling conflicts
records.reference:
- Law Society of Alberta: https://www.lawsociety.ab.ca/
- Alberta Legal Tech Community: https://www.linkedin.com/groups/alberta-legal-technology/
- Canadian Bar Association Technology Section: https://www.cba.org/Sections/Technology-Law

records.title: Legal Compliance Consultation & Requirements Analysis
records.description: Schedule flat-fee consultation with Alberta lawyer to establish compliance framework, understand PIPA requirements, and clarify unauthorized practice of law boundaries.
records.success_criteria: Legal consultation completed, PIPA compliance checklist created, UPL boundaries documented, privacy policy template obtained
records.dependencies: Basic project concept documentation ready
records.risks: Lawyer availability, higher consultation costs than expected, discovery of major compliance barriers
records.reference:
- Law Society of Alberta Directory: https://www.lawsociety.ab.ca/lawyer-directory/
- Alberta PIPA Guide: https://www.servicealberta.ca/foip/pipa/
- Legal Technology Ethics Resources: https://www.cba.org/Publications-Resources/Practice-Resources/Practice-Management/Legal-Technology

records.title: Backend Architecture & Document Security Foundation
records.description: WEEKEND INTENSIVE after add/drop settles. Build secure document management backend with Convex, implement user authentication, and establish document storage with encryption.
records.success_criteria: Convex backend deployed to cloud, AES-256 encryption active, user authentication working, secure file upload/download operational
records.dependencies: None - project kickoff task
records.risks: Learning curve with Convex platform, encryption implementation complexity, authentication security vulnerabilities
records.reference:
- Convex Documentation: https://docs.convex.dev/
- Node.js Crypto Documentation: https://nodejs.org/api/crypto.html
- JWT Authentication Best Practices: https://auth0.com/blog/a-look-at-the-latest-draft-for-jwt-bcp/

records.title: Frontend Foundation & User Management Interface
records.description: WEEKEND INTENSIVE. Build React frontend with TypeScript, implement responsive design, create user registration/login flows, and document upload interface.
records.success_criteria: React app responsive across devices, user registration/login functional, document upload interface operational, Tailwind CSS configured
records.dependencies: Backend API endpoints defined
records.risks: Framework selection complexity, responsive design challenges, UI/UX design inexperience
records.reference:
- React 19 Documentation: https://react.dev/
- TypeScript Handbook: https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/
- Tailwind CSS Documentation: https://tailwindcss.com/docs

records.title: PIPA Compliance Implementation & Privacy Framework
records.description: CRITICAL WEEKEND SPRINT. Implement comprehensive PIPA compliance including data encryption, consent management, audit logging, and privacy controls.
records.success_criteria: PIPA compliance fully implemented, consent management system operational, audit logging active, data retention policies configured
records.dependencies: Backend architecture completion, legal consultation results
records.risks: Regulatory misunderstanding, implementation complexity, data breach vulnerabilities during development
records.reference:
- PIPA Compliance Guide: https://oipc.ab.ca/guidance/pipa/
- Privacy by Design Framework: https://www.ipc.on.ca/wp-content/uploads/resources/7foundationalprinciples.pdf
- Data Encryption Standards: https://csrc.nist.gov/publications/detail/sp/800-175b/rev-1/final

records.title: Alberta Legal Forms Collection & Cataloguing System
records.description: Systematically collect public Alberta court forms and legal templates, organize by jurisdiction and practice area, implement intelligent search system.
records.success_criteria: 100+ Alberta court forms catalogued, search by practice area functional, forms organized by jurisdiction, PDF handling operational
records.dependencies: Document management foundation, legal compliance framework
records.risks: Form availability changes, PDF processing complexity, copyright concerns with form templates
records.reference:
- Alberta Court Forms: https://www.albertacourts.ca/court-forms
- Court of Queen's Bench Forms: https://www.albertacourts.ca/qb/resources/forms
- Provincial Court Forms: https://www.albertacourts.ca/pc/resources/forms

records.title: Advanced Document Management & Version Control
records.description: Build enterprise-grade document management with version control, metadata management, and granular sharing permissions for professional legal workflows.
records.success_criteria: Document versioning system operational, metadata tagging functional, granular permissions working, document history tracking complete
records.dependencies: Backend foundation complete, PIPA compliance implemented
records.risks: Version control complexity, performance impact of metadata, permission system bugs
records.reference:
- Git Version Control Concepts: https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Getting-Started-About-Version-Control
- Document Management Systems Guide: https://www.aiim.org/What-is-Document-Management
- Role-Based Access Control: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Role-based_access_control

records.title: Alberta Lawyer Directory Integration
records.description: Build searchable directory using publicly available Law Society of Alberta lawyer information, implement search by practice area, location, and credentials.
records.success_criteria: Law Society data successfully integrated, search by practice area functional, contact information displayed, location-based search working
records.dependencies: Core platform stability, legal compliance verification
records.risks: Data scraping limitations, Law Society website changes, data accuracy maintenance
records.reference:
- Law Society of Alberta Directory: https://www.lawsociety.ab.ca/lawyer-directory/
- Law Society Public Information: https://www.lawsociety.ab.ca/public/lawyer-directory/
- Legal Directory Best Practices: https://www.americanbar.org/groups/legal_services/resources/directory/

records.title: Professional UI/UX Design & Responsiveness
records.description: PARALLEL WORK during mid-term break. Polish interface to meet legal industry professional standards with excellent responsive design and accessibility.
records.success_criteria: Professional legal industry design implemented, mobile responsive across devices, WCAG accessibility compliant, load times under 2 seconds
records.dependencies: Core frontend functionality complete
records.risks: Design inexperience, accessibility compliance complexity, performance optimization challenges
records.reference:
- WCAG Guidelines: https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/quickref/
- Legal Industry Design Standards: https://www.lawsitesblog.com/2023/01/law-firm-website-design-trends.html
- Performance Optimization: https://web.dev/performance/

records.title: Document Collaboration Features (Non-Advisory)
records.description: Build document collaboration tools including commenting, annotation, and activity tracking while ensuring no legal advice features are included.
records.success_criteria: Document commenting system operational, annotation tools functional, activity notifications working, collaboration history tracked
records.dependencies: Advanced document management complete
records.risks: Feature scope creep into legal advice territory, real-time collaboration complexity
records.reference:
- Collaborative Document Design: https://www.nngroup.com/articles/collaborative-editing/
- Legal Ethics in Technology: https://www.americanbar.org/groups/professional_responsibility/publications/model_rules_of_professional_conduct/
- Real-time Collaboration Patterns: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/patterns/event-sourcing

records.title: Demo Preparation & Pitch Deck Creation
records.description: Create comprehensive demonstration materials including interactive demo, pitch deck, and recorded video for legal tech professional presentations.
records.success_criteria: 15-slide pitch deck complete, 3-minute demo video recorded, interactive demo functional, elevator pitch memorized
records.dependencies: Core features functional, professional network established
records.risks: Demo technical failures, presentation skills gaps, negative professional feedback
records.reference:
- Pitch Deck Best Practices: https://www.slideshare.net/PitchDeckCoach/pitch-deck-guide-analysis-of-400-pitch-decks
- Demo Presentation Tips: https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/how-to-give-a-great-product-demo
- Legal Tech Presentation Guide: https://www.legalevolution.org/2019/06/how-to-pitch-legal-technology/

records.title: Legal Resource Information Directory
records.description: PARALLEL DEVELOPMENT. Curate comprehensive directory of Alberta legal information resources, court information, and process guides (public information only).
records.success_criteria: 500+ legal resources indexed, semantic search operational, resource categorization complete, regular update system implemented
records.dependencies: Core platform functionality stable
records.risks: Resource data quality issues, information accuracy maintenance, content licensing concerns
records.reference:
- Alberta Justice Resources: https://www.alberta.ca/justice.aspx
- Alberta Courts Self-Help Resources: https://www.albertacourts.ca/help-information
- Legal Aid Alberta: https://www.legalaid.ab.ca/help/Pages/default.aspx

records.title: User Testing with Legal Professionals
records.description: Intensive user testing weekend with Alberta legal professionals, gather feedback on workflows and implement critical improvements immediately.
records.success_criteria: 15+ legal professionals complete testing, feedback documented and analyzed, 85%+ satisfaction achieved, critical issues resolved
records.dependencies: Mid-term break development complete, demo-ready features available
records.risks: Professional availability on weekends, discovering major usability issues late in development
records.reference:
- User Testing Best Practices: https://www.nngroup.com/articles/user-testing-101/
- Legal Professional Feedback Methods: https://www.lawpracticemagazine.org/article/user-experience-design-for-lawyers
- Usability Testing Guidelines: https://www.usability.gov/how-to-and-tools/methods/planning-usability-testing.html

records.title: Analytics Dashboard & Usage Metrics
records.description: Build PIPA-compliant analytics system to track document usage, user engagement, and platform performance with professional reporting capabilities.
records.success_criteria: Analytics dashboard operational with 10+ key metrics, PIPA-compliant data handling, performance monitoring active, usage reports generated
records.dependencies: User base established, core platform features mature
records.risks: Privacy compliance complexity with analytics, performance impact of tracking, data visualization challenges
records.reference:
- PIPA Analytics Compliance: https://www.servicealberta.ca/foip/pipa/
- Privacy-Compliant Analytics: https://blog.google/products/marketingplatform/analytics/new_ways_help_meet_evolving_privacy_needs/
- Dashboard Design Principles: https://www.klipfolio.com/resources/articles/what-is-a-data-dashboard

records.title: Mobile Optimization & PWA Implementation
records.description: Optimize platform for mobile legal professionals with Progressive Web App capabilities and offline document viewing functionality.
records.success_criteria: Progressive Web App functional, offline document viewing operational, mobile-optimized interface complete, app store submission ready
records.dependencies: Core web platform stable, UI/UX optimization complete
records.risks: PWA complexity, offline sync challenges, mobile performance optimization
records.reference:
- Progressive Web App Guide: https://web.dev/progressive-web-apps/
- PWA Best Practices: https://developers.google.com/web/progressive-web-apps/checklist
- Mobile-First Design: https://www.uxpin.com/studio/blog/a-hands-on-guide-to-mobile-first-design/

records.title: Security Audit & Penetration Testing
records.description: Comprehensive security review including penetration testing to ensure platform meets legal industry security standards and compliance requirements.
records.success_criteria: Security vulnerabilities identified and resolved, penetration testing passed, compliance audit successful, security documentation complete
records.dependencies: All core features implemented and stable
records.risks: Discovery of critical security flaws, time constraints for vulnerability fixes, compliance gaps
records.reference:
- OWASP Security Testing Guide: https://owasp.org/www-project-web-security-testing-guide/
- Legal Industry Security Standards: https://www.americanbar.org/groups/departments_offices/legal_technology_resources/resources/charts_fyis/cloud-ethics-chart/
- Penetration Testing Methodology: https://www.sans.org/white-papers/1545/

records.title: Performance Optimization & Load Testing
records.description: Optimize platform performance for professional legal environment usage with comprehensive load testing and database optimization.
records.success_criteria: Platform handles 100+ concurrent users, page load times under 2 seconds, database queries optimized, caching implemented
records.dependencies: All features complete, analytics system operational
records.risks: Performance bottlenecks in document handling, database scaling challenges, optimization complexity
records.reference:
- Web Performance Optimization: https://web.dev/performance/
- Load Testing Best Practices: https://www.blazemeter.com/blog/performance-testing-vs-load-testing-vs-stress-testing
- Database Performance Tuning: https://use-the-index-luke.com/

records.title: API Documentation & Developer Resources
records.description: Create comprehensive technical documentation including API docs, integration guides, and deployment instructions for professional evaluation.
records.success_criteria: Complete API documentation published, integration examples working, deployment guide tested, developer onboarding materials ready
records.dependencies: All core features stabilized, platform architecture finalized
records.risks: Documentation completeness gaps, technical writing quality, example code maintenance
records.reference:
- API Documentation Best Practices: https://swagger.io/resources/articles/best-practices-in-api-documentation/
- Technical Writing Guide: https://developers.google.com/tech-writing
- Developer Experience Design: https://dx.tips/

records.title: Legal Compliance Final Review & Documentation
records.description: Final comprehensive legal review to ensure all compliance requirements are met and documented before market launch and potential acquisition.
records.success_criteria: Legal compliance fully verified, privacy audit documentation complete, regulatory compliance certificate obtained, legal risk assessment documented
records.dependencies: All platform features complete and security tested
records.risks: Discovery of compliance gaps requiring major changes, legal review delays, certification process complications
records.reference:
- Legal Compliance Checklist: https://www.cba.org/Publications-Resources/Practice-Resources/Practice-Management/Legal-Technology
- PIPA Final Review Guide: https://www.servicealberta.ca/foip/pipa/
- Legal Tech Due Diligence: https://www.americanbar.org/groups/departments_offices/legal_technology_resources/

records.title: Production Deployment & Monitoring Setup
records.description: Deploy production-grade platform with enterprise monitoring, backup systems, and disaster recovery capabilities for professional use.
records.success_criteria: Production environment stable with 99.9% uptime, comprehensive monitoring active, automated backups working, disaster recovery tested
records.dependencies: Security audit passed, performance optimization complete
records.risks: Deployment complexity, monitoring system configuration, backup system failures
records.reference:
- Production Deployment Best Practices: https://12factor.net/
- Application Monitoring Guide: https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitoring-101-collecting-data/
- Disaster Recovery Planning: https://aws.amazon.com/disaster-recovery/

records.title: Marketing Materials & Portfolio Documentation
records.description: Create professional marketing website, case studies, and comprehensive portfolio documentation showcasing technical achievements and capabilities.
records.success_criteria: Professional marketing website live, 3+ detailed case studies complete, portfolio documentation comprehensive, technical achievements highlighted
records.dependencies: Platform fully functional, user testing feedback integrated
records.risks: Marketing content quality, portfolio presentation effectiveness, time constraints during exam preparation
records.reference:
- Tech Portfolio Best Practices: https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/15-web-developer-portfolios-to-inspire-you/
- Legal Tech Marketing Guide: https://www.legalevolution.org/2018/04/how-to-market-legal-technology/
- Case Study Writing: https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/how-to-write-a-case-study

records.title: Legal Tech Community Presentations & Pilots
records.description: Present platform to Alberta legal community, establish pilot programs with interested law firms, and build professional network for future opportunities.
records.success_criteria: 3+ law firm presentations completed, 2+ pilot programs initiated, 5+ professional references obtained, legal community presence established
records.dependencies: Platform production-ready, marketing materials complete
records.risks: Professional presentation skills, law firm scheduling during busy period, pilot program complexity
records.reference:
- Legal Tech Presentation Guide: https://www.legalevolution.org/2019/06/how-to-pitch-legal-technology/
- Professional Networking in Legal: https://www.americanbar.org/groups/gpsolo/publications/gpsolo_ereport/2019/july-2019/networking-legal-professionals/
- Pilot Program Best Practices: https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/how-to-run-a-pilot-program

records.title: Acquisition Outreach & Transition Planning
records.description: MINIMAL TIME - Finals priority! Contact potential buyers, conduct acquisition discussions, and prepare transition documentation. Maximum 30 minutes per day.
records.success_criteria: 10+ potential buyers contacted, 3+ serious acquisition discussions initiated, transition plan documented, post-graduation strategy defined
records.dependencies: All platform features complete, legal compliance verified, portfolio ready
records.risks: CRITICAL: Must not impact final exam preparation. Buyer interest timing, acquisition complexity, transition planning gaps
records.reference:
- Tech Company Acquisition Guide: https://techcrunch.com/2019/09/24/how-to-sell-your-startup/
- Legal Tech M&A Trends: https://www.legalevolution.org/2020/01/legal-tech-ma-activity/
- Business Transition Planning: https://www.sba.gov/business-guide/manage-your-business/prepare-exit-strategy
